code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import ExpenseForm from"./components/ExpenseForm";import ExpenseList from"./components/ExpenseList";import Dashboard from"./components/Dashboard";import{getExpenses,addExpense,deleteExpense}from"./api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[expenses,setExpenses]=useState([]);const loadExpenses=async()=>{const data=await getExpenses();setExpenses(data);};useEffect(()=>{loadExpenses();},[]);const handleAddExpense=async expense=>{await addExpense(expense);await loadExpenses();};const handleDeleteExpense=async id=>{if(window.confirm("Are you sure you want to delete this expense?")){await deleteExpense(id);await loadExpenses();}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6 max-w-2xl mx-auto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Expense Tracker"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExpenseForm,{onAdd:handleAddExpense}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dashboard,{expenses:expenses}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExpenseList,{expenses:expenses,onDelete:handleDeleteExpense})]});}export default App;
